/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
